FoodModalities.notes: Common in young females with metabolic acceleration

FoodModalities.notes: Often found in children with viral fevers.

rubric: Craving for ice during fever
modality: Desire for cold crunch in hot state
notes: Often found in children with viral fevers.

rubric: Aversion to milk in children
modality: Refuses breast milk or vomits after
notes: Useful in infantile diarrhea and lactose intolerance.

rubric: Desire for indigestible things (pica)
modality: Craving for chalk, mud, sand
notes: Common in children with worm infestation or anemia.

rubric: Craving for eggs
modality: Strong desire, eats frequently
notes: Eggs cause no trouble; patient thrives on them.

rubric: Aversion to sweets
modality: Dislikes or feels worse after sweets
notes: Often seen in liver or gall bladder disturbances.

rubric: Craving for spicy food
modality: Likes highly seasoned or pungent food
notes: Linked to high reactivity or addictive tendencies.

rubric: Craving for salt
modality: Desires salty food or adds extra salt
notes: Strong keynote in Natrum mur constitution.

rubric: Aversion to fat or oily food
modality: Cannot tolerate fried or greasy food
notes: Useful in digestive disturbances with nausea.

rubric: Craving for sour things
modality: Eats lemons, pickles, sour fruits
notes: Often found in pregnancy and liver disorders.

rubric: Craving for cold drinks even in winter
modality: Wants cold water, avoids warm drinks
notes: Indicates high thirst and burning sensation internally.

rubric: Aversion to bread
modality: Dislikes or feels full quickly after bread
notes: Useful in gastric troubles with bloating and flatulence.

rubric: Craving for sweets
modality: Addicted to sweets or worsens after eating them
notes: Common in children, diabetics, and anxiety states.

rubric: Aversion to meat
modality: Dislikes meat or cannot digest it well
notes: Seen in gentle, emotional patients with weak digestion.

rubric: Craving for alcohol
modality: Needs daily dose or gets aggressive without it
notes: Often seen in irritable, driven, or anxious individuals.

rubric: Craving for cold food
modality: Prefers food cold, hates warm dishes
notes: Strong keynote in Phosphorus cases with internal burning.

rubric: Desire for raw food
modality: Eats uncooked vegetables, fruits
notes: Often seen in digestive weakness and sluggish metabolism.

rubric: Aversion to water
modality: Doesn't want to drink even when thirsty
notes: Keynote of Apis with scanty thirst despite fever or heat.

rubric: Craving for milk
modality: Desires milk repeatedly; it agrees well
notes: Useful in children with bone issues or craving calcium.

rubric: Aversion to salt
modality: Refuses salty food or bland taste preference
notes: Seen in hormonal issues, menopause, or uterine cases.

rubric: Craving for sour pickles during pregnancy
modality: Strong desire for sour, tangy foods
notes: Key indicator in morning sickness or hormonal nausea.

rubric: Craving for fatty and fried food
modality: Desires oily, spicy fried snacks
notes: Often causes aggravation in liver or gastric patients.

rubric: Aversion to eggs
modality: Dislikes smell or taste of eggs
notes: Eggs may cause nausea or vomiting; a strong keynote.

rubric: Craving for onions
modality: Desires raw or cooked onions regularly
notes: Useful in hormonal imbalances or circulatory states.

rubric: Aversion to spicy food
modality: Spices aggravate; prefers bland food
notes: Seen in delicate constitutions with gastric sensitivity.

rubric: Craving for chocolate
modality: Desires chocolate often, even secretly
notes: Often linked with anxiety, impulsivity, or cravings.

rubric: Aversion to cooked food
modality: Prefers raw or uncooked meals
notes: May be connected to poor appetite or sluggish digestion.

rubric: Craving for coffee
modality: Wants coffee repeatedly or is sensitive to its absence
notes: Mental alertness, habit-forming tendency; classic in Nux vomica.

rubric: Aversion to fruits
modality: Fruits worsen digestion or disliked generally
notes: Seen in gastric individuals with sour eructations or acidity.

rubric: Craving for ice cream
modality: Desires cold creamy sweets, especially in warm states
notes: Can soothe internal heat or irritability temporarily.

rubric: Aversion to vegetables
modality: Dislikes greens or boiled veggies
notes: May be linked to indifference to healthy lifestyle.

rubric: Craving for ice (chewing ice)
modality: Wants to chew ice frequently, even without fever
notes: Often seen in anemic or iron-deficient individuals.

rubric: Aversion to warm food
modality: Cannot tolerate warm meals, prefers cool
notes: Strong keynote in Phosphorus with internal heat.

rubric: Craving for cheese
modality: Desires cheese often or in large quantities
notes: Seen in children with intestinal and digestive issues.

rubric: Aversion to milk in adults
modality: Dislikes milk, feels bloated or nauseated
notes: Useful in lactose intolerance, weak digestion types.

rubric: Craving for beer or fermented drinks
modality: Strong desire despite aggravation or liver issues
notes: Often in hot-blooded, pleasure-seeking individuals.

rubric: Craving for fish
modality: Desires sea food or fish-based dishes
notes: Helpful when weakness follows seafood deprivation.

rubric: Aversion to meat after illness
modality: Dislikes heavy foods during recovery
notes: Seen in convalescence with low vitality.

rubric: Craving for garlic
modality: Desires garlic daily or in high quantities
notes: Associated with circulatory and hormonal issues.

rubric: Aversion to sweets after grief

notes: Important rubric in mental-emotional shock states.

rubric: Craving for sour curd or buttermilk
modality: Desires sour milk-based products
notes: Keynote in digestive disturbances and acidity.

rubric: Craving for hot and spicy food in cold climate
modality: Desires pungent spices to feel internal heat
notes: Seen in chilly persons or those with low vitality.

rubric: Aversion to sour food
modality: Rejects pickles, vinegar, sour fruits
notes: Often indicates weak digestion or liver disturbance.

rubric: Craving for boiled eggs
modality: Desires boiled eggs frequently
notes: Important in weak children and chronic skin conditions.

rubric: Craving for burnt food (burnt toast, roasted edges)
modality: Desires burnt portions of food
notes: Rare modality often seen in hormonal imbalances.

rubric: Aversion to water during fever
modality: Refuses to drink even with dryness
notes: Strong keynote in Apis with thirstlessness during inflammation.

rubric: Craving for crust of bread
modality: Desires hard outer crust, not soft inner part
notes: Seen in hungry, fast-eating types or children.

rubric: Aversion to coffee
modality: Dislikes coffee or worsens after drinking
notes: Useful in irritable, over-sensitive individuals.

rubric: Craving for lemon or citrus
modality: Desires lemon juice, citrus fruits regularly
notes: Seen in liver complaints, nausea, or early pregnancy.

rubric: Aversion to chocolate
modality: Dislikes chocolate or feels worse after eating
notes: Observed in hormonal and sensitive digestive cases.

rubric: Craving for food at night (midnight hunger)
modality: Gets up to eat in the night or early morning
notes: Indicates gastric irritability or high metabolism.

rubric: Craving for uncooked rice or raw grains
modality: Desires raw rice, wheat, or raw pulses
notes: Often seen in pica and anemic states, especially in children and pregnant women.

rubric: Aversion to oily food during menses
modality: Rejects fatty foods around menstrual period

rubric: Craving for toasted or dry foods
modality: Prefers dry foods like toast or biscuits
notes: Helps in cases with nausea or easy satiety.

rubric: Aversion to cooked smell of food
modality: Nausea or vomiting from kitchen smell
notes: Very strong keynote in pregnancy nausea (Sepia, Colchicum).

rubric: Craving for ice cream during fever
modality: Demands ice cream even when febrile
notes: Phosphorus shows peculiar inner burning and cold desire.

rubric: Aversion to milk during fever
modality: Milk aggravates or induces vomiting
notes: Helpful in fevers of digestive origin, especially in children.

rubric: Craving for spicy pickles with rice
modality: Needs spice with every meal to feel satisfied
notes: Common in irritable temperaments with digestive issues.

rubric: Aversion to bitter vegetables (like neem, karela)
modality: Refuses traditional bitter vegetables

rubric: Craving for sugar crystals or jaggery
modality: Desires raw sugar, not just sweets

rubric: Aversion to sour curd
modality: Cannot tolerate curd or fermented milk products
notes: Useful in digestive and hormonal complaints.

rubric: Craving for raw vegetables (carrot, beetroot, etc.)
modality: Eats uncooked vegetables frequently
notes: Helpful in constipation and heat sensations.

rubric: Aversion to rice
modality: Dislikes plain rice or feels heavy after it
notes: Seen in sluggish digestive systems with acidity.

rubric: Craving for burnt match smell or carbon
modality: Attracted to burnt or smoky smell
notes: Rare craving seen in pica and mental disorders.

modality: Eats banana regularly, even in illness

rubric: Aversion to banana
modality: Refuses banana; feels bloated or nauseated after it

modality: Wants tender coconut or raw coconut daily

rubric: Aversion to coconut
modality: Dislikes coconut-based food or sweets

rubric: Craving for roasted seeds or nuts

rubric: Aversion to nuts and dry fruits
modality: Avoids nuts due to heaviness or dislike
notes: Seen in people with weak gastric tolerance or aversion to oily food.

rubric: Craving for stale or fermented food
modality: Likes food that is aged, fermented, or leftover

rubric: Aversion to ghee or clarified butter
modality: Dislikes greasy textures or smell of ghee

rubric: Craving for khatta dal (sour pulses)
modality: Desires tangy, sour dal frequently

rubric: Aversion to sweets in the morning
modality: Rejects sweet foods in early hours of day

rubric: Craving for raw tamarind or imli
modality: Desires tamarind pulp, raw sour taste

rubric: Aversion to spicy food during fever
modality: Rejects spicy meals while febrile

modality: Desires junk, spicy tangy food from vendors

rubric: Aversion to dal (lentils)

rubric: Craving for curd rice
modality: Wants curd mixed with rice daily

rubric: Aversion to tea
modality: Dislikes tea; causes nausea or discomfort

rubric: Craving for green leafy vegetables

modality: Desires raw mango slices or chutneys

rubric: Craving for sweet curd

rubric: Aversion to pickles

rubric: Craving for sugarcane juice
modality: Desires sugarcane juice during fatigue or heat

rubric: Aversion to water after meals
modality: Avoids drinking water post food intake

rubric: Aversion to food smell from others' plates

rubric: Craving for roasted or burnt chillies
modality: Desires spicy roasted chillies or chutneys with heat

rubric: Aversion to non-vegetarian food after illness

rubric: Aversion to raw onions
modality: Avoids raw onions due to smell, irritation

rubric: Craving for butter or clarified butter (ghee)
modality: Desires pure fats like butter or ghee often

rubric: Aversion to hot drinks
modality: Prefers cold beverages; avoids tea, soup, coffee

rubric: Craving for dried fish
modality: Desires strong-smelling dried seafood

rubric: Aversion to raw garlic
modality: Dislikes raw garlic taste or smell

modality: Desires very plain food; finds it soothing

rubric: Aversion to food during headache

rubric: Aversion to food after anger

modality: Desires steaming broth, lentil or meat soup in winter

rubric: Aversion to meat during pregnancy
modality: Refuses meat smell or taste when pregnant

modality: Desires crunchy food frequently between meals

rubric: Aversion to sweets in the evening
modality: Feels heaviness or nausea with sweets after sunset

rubric: Craving for ice-cold carbonated drinks
modality: Wants fizzy, cold beverages even in winter

rubric: Aversion to breakfast
modality: No hunger or dislikes eating early morning

rubric: Craving for thick buttermilk with salt
modality: Likes salted curd drinks, especially in summer

rubric: Aversion to sweets during fever
modality: Refuses sweet items while having a fever

rubric: Craving for bitter tasting food
modality: Desires neem, bitter gourd, herbal teas

rubric: Aversion to milk in children

rubric: Craving for plain boiled pulses

rubric: Aversion to food after physical exertion

rubric: Craving for sugar syrup (panakam, sugar water)
modality: Desires sweetened water or jaggery drinks

rubric: Aversion to bitter medicines or tonics

rubric: Craving for spicy masala powders (karam podi)

rubric: Aversion to sour fruits (orange, tamarind)

rubric: Craving for food mixed together (messy plate)

rubric: Aversion to solid food prefers only liquids

rubric: Craving for bitter coffee without milk
modality: Desires black, unsweetened coffee

rubric: Aversion to warm food wants only cold meals

rubric: Craving for fast food (pizza, burgers, noodles)

rubric: Aversion to homemade traditional food
modality: Rejects simple meals, prefers spicy, commercial food

rubric: Craving for sweets only at night
modality: Feels sudden desire for sweet snacks late night

rubric: Aversion to food after toilet (bowel motion)
modality: Loss of appetite after passing stool

rubric: Craving for extremely spicy chutneys
modality: Needs extremely spicy side dishes with food

rubric: Aversion to breakfast cereals
modality: Dislikes cornflakes, oats, muesli, etc.

rubric: Craving for ice cubes or chewing ice
modality: Frequently chews or sucks on ice cubes

rubric: Aversion to spicy masala powders (karam podi)

rubric: Craving for sour pickled gooseberry (amla)

rubric: Craving for jaggery water (bellam neellu)

rubric: Aversion to oil-smeared food (ghee or oil applied)
modality: Avoids visibly oily or ghee-laden food

rubric: Aversion to food cooked by others

modality: Frequently desires sour-spicy tamarind flavored rice

rubric: Craving for boiled sweet corn or popcorn
modality: Desires hot corn snacks regularly

rubric: Aversion to cold milk

rubric: Craving for lemon with salt

rubric: Craving for honey or jaggery-based sweets

rubric: Aversion to tea with milk

modality: Dislikes coconut-based curries or sweets

rubric: Craving for street food (chaat, pani puri)

rubric: Craving for boiled or steamed food only

rubric: Aversion to strong food odors

modality: Dislikes banana due to its texture or aftertaste

modality: Desires strong hot liquid food while unwell

rubric: Craving for food with sour-sweet combination

rubric: Craving for thick curd with rice

rubric: Craving for toasted bread with ghee or butter

rubric: Aversion to toasted or baked items

rubric: Craving for soft overripe fruits
modality: Desires banana, sapota, papaya in mushy form
notes: Helpful in constipation, dry stools, or weak digestion.

rubric: Aversion to fruits with fibrous texture
modality: Avoids fruits like pineapple or guava due to hard or seedy feel
notes: Seen in picky eaters or those with oral sensitivity.

rubric: Craving for freshly cooked hot rice
modality: Wants hot steaming rice with ghee immediately after cooking
notes: Seen in appetite-strong, heat-loving constitutions.

rubric: Aversion to leftover or cold rice
modality: Rejects refrigerated or previous dayâ€™s rice
notes: Common in people who dislike stale energy or fermentation.

rubric: Craving for dry chutneys and powders (karam podi)
modality: Desires spicy dry powders with rice or idli regularly
notes: Seen in high-pitta constitutions and traditional food lovers.

rubric: Aversion to dry powders and spice mixes
modality: Finds dry powders irritating or choking while eating
notes: Typical in delicate throat and weak digestion cases.

rubric: Craving for thick gravies or saucy food
modality: Enjoys food with thick, spicy gravy or sauce
notes: Helpful in identifying desire for intensity and strong taste.

rubric: Aversion to spicy gravies
modality: Avoids spicy curries due to burning or bloating
notes: Seen in gastric ulcer-prone and pitta-aggravated patients.

rubric: Craving for flavored rice (lemon rice, tamarind rice)
modality: Desires tangy, flavored rice over plain meals
notes: Seen in children and snack-prone or variety-seeking eaters.

rubric: Aversion to colored or strongly flavored rice
modality: Prefers white, bland rice; avoids lemon/tamarind rice
notes: Seen in people with food sensitivity or low appetite.

rubric: Craving for soft idli with ghee or sugar
modality: Loves soft white idlis with ghee or jaggery
notes: Common in toddlers, children, and delicate constitutions.

rubric: Aversion to fermented idli/dosa batter smell
modality: Dislikes sour smell of fermented batter
notes: Seen in nausea-prone, gastric-sensitive people.

rubric: Craving for pani puri with spicy water
modality: Regular desire for tangy, spicy, street-side snacks
notes: Common in young adults with restless or adventurous nature.

rubric: Aversion to pani puri due to stomach upset
modality: Avoids pani puri as it causes loose motions or acidity
notes: Seen in weak digestion, IBS or cautious eaters.
